mean_en: a person who stops being a member of a group in order to join another group that opposes it
word_etyma: turn转动+coat上衣，外套 → 旧时士兵战败翻转外套以掩盖服色标志视为变节 → turncoat变节者，背叛者
short_phrase: the traitorous turncoat and his knife
sentence: I thought he was on our side, but it turns out he was a turncoat!
sentence_trans: 我以为他是站在我们这边的，结果他是一个叛徒！
